member.name: T:M.MidiContext
member.summary: Represents the current state of a playing MIDI sequence

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.Channels
member.summary: Indicates the channels for the current MIDI context

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.RunningStatus
member.summary: Indicates the running status byte for the current MIDI context

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.ChannelPrefix
member.summary: Indicates the channel prefix for the current MIDI context

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.MicroTempo
member.summary: Indicates the micro tempo for the current MIDI context

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.TimeBase
member.summary: Indicates the time base for the current MIDI context

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.Ticks
member.summary: Indicates the number of MIDI ticks that have elapsed

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.SystemTicks
member.summary: Indicates the number of system ticks that have elapsed

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.Time
member.summary: Indicates the time of the current position

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.TimeSignature
member.summary: Indicates the time signature for the current MIDI context

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.KeySignature
member.summary: Indicates the key signature for the current MIDI context

member.name: M:M.MidiContext.#ctor(System.Int16)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of a MidiContext

member.name: M:M.MidiContext.Process(M.MidiEvent)
member.summary: Processes an event
member.param: The event to process. The event.Message member can be null in which case the message part is not processed

member.name: M:M.MidiContext.Process(M.MidiMessage)
member.summary: Process a message, adjusting the MIDI context

member.name: T:M.MidiContext.Channel
member.summary: Represents the status of a MIDI channel

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.Channel.Controls
member.summary: Indicates the current MIDI CC values for the channel

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.Channel.Notes
member.summary: Indicates the current MIDI note states for the channel

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.Channel.KeyPressure
member.summary: Indicates the current MIDI aftertouch for the current key

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.Channel.ChannelPressure
member.summary: Indicates the current MIDI aftertouch for the current channel

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.Channel.PitchWheel
member.summary: Indicates the current position of the MIDI pitch wheel

member.name: P:M.MidiContext.Channel.Program
member.summary: Indicates the current MIDI patch for the channel

member.name: M:M.MidiContext.Clone
member.summary: Creates a deep copy of the MIDI context
member.returns: A new copy of the MIDI context

member.summary: Indicates the position in MIDI ticks

member.summary: Indicates the MIDI message associated with this event

member.name: T:M.MidiFile
member.summary: Represents a MIDI file

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.#ctor(System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: Constructs a MIDI file of the specified type with the specified timebase
member.param: The MIDI file type - either 0, 1 or 2
The timebase of the MIDI file in ticks/pulses per quarter note
member.remarks: Normally the default timebase in the API is 24, but that's undesirable for most MIDI files, so this defaults to 480, which is a much more realistic resolution

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.Preview(M.MidiOutputDevice,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Plays the file over the specified device
member.param: The MIDI output device to use
Indicates whether to loop playback or not

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.Resample(System.Int16)
member.summary: Changes the timebase of the MIDI file
member.param: The new timebase, in ticks/pulses per quarter note

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.FilePath
member.summary: Indicates the name of the file this was loaded from or saved to, if available, otherwise null

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Name
member.summary: Returns the internal name of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's name

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Copyright
member.summary: Returns the copyright information of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's copyright metadata

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.MicroTempo
member.summary: Indicates the MicroTempo of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's microtempo

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.MicroTempos
member.summary: Indicates all of the MicroTempos of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's microtempos

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Tempo
member.summary: Indicates the Tempo of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's tempo

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Tempos
member.summary: Indicates all of the Tempos of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's tempos

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.TimeSignature
member.summary: Indicates the time signature of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's time signature

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.TimeSignatures
member.summary: Indicates all the time signatures of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's time signatures

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.KeySignature
member.summary: Indicates the key signature of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's key signature

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.KeySignatures
member.summary: Indicates all the key signatures of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's key signatures

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Duration
member.summary: Indicates the duration of the MIDI file as a

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.DurationSystemTicks
member.summary: Indicates the duration of the MIDI file in system ticks

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Type
member.summary: Indicates the type of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This can be 0, 1 or 2

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.TimeBase
member.summary: Indicates the timebase of the MIDI file as ticks/pulses per quarter note

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Tracks
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all MIDI tracks in the file

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Length
member.summary: Indicates the total length of the MIDI file, in ticks/pulses

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Comments
member.summary: Indicates the comments of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's comments

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Markers
member.summary: Indicates the MIDI Markers of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's markers

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.Lyrics
member.summary: Indicates the lyrics of the MIDI file
member.remarks: This is derived from Track #0's lyrics

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.FirstDownBeat
member.summary: Indicates the position of the first beat of the MIDI file in pulses/ticks

member.name: P:M.MidiFile.FirstNoteOn
member.summary: Indicates the position of the first note on message in the MIDI file in pulses/ticks

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.Transpose(System.SByte,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transposes the notes in a file, optionally wrapping the note values
member.param: The number of MIDI notes to add or subtract
True if out of range notes are wrapped, false if they are to be clipped
True if drum/percussion notes are to be left alone, otherwise false
member.returns: A new MIDI file with the notes transposed

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.Stretch(System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stretches or compresses the MIDI file events
member.remarks: If is false this will change the playback speed of the MIDI
member.param: The differential for the size. 1 is the same length, .5 would be half the length and 2 would be twice the length
Indicates whether or not the tempo should be adjusted to compensate
member.returns: A new MIDI file that is stretched the specified amount

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.AdjustTempo(System.Double)
member.summary: Adjusts the tempo of a MIDI file
member.returns: A new file with an adjusted tempo. All other tempo messages are adjusted relatively to the first one

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.AdjustTempo(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adjusts the tempo of a MIDI file
member.returns: A new file with an adjusted tempo. All other tempo messages are adjusted relatively to the first one

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.ScaleTempo(System.Double)
member.summary: Scales the tempo of a file to a new relative tempo
member.param: The relative difference in the tempo. Higher makes the tempo higher
member.returns: A new file with the adjusted tempo. All tempo messages are adjusted relatively

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.GetRange(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a range of events as a new MidiFile
member.param: True to copy the current timing and patch info, otherwise false
True to eliminate tracks that end up with no events, otherwise false

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.ScaleVelocities(System.Double)
member.summary: Scales the velocity levels
member.returns: A new MIDI file with the levels scaled

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.NormalizeVelocities
member.summary: Normalizes the velocity levels
member.returns: A new MIDI file with the levels normalized

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.Clone
member.summary: Creates a deep copy of the MIDI file
member.returns: A new MIDI file that is equivelent to this MIDI file

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.ReadFrom(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads a MIDI file from the specified stream
member.returns: A MIDI file object representing the MIDI data in the stream

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.ReadFrom(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a MIDI file from the specified file
member.returns: A new instance representing the MIDI file

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.WriteTo(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the MIDI file to the specified stream

member.name: M:M.MidiFile.WriteTo(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the MIDI file to the specified file

member.name: P:M.MidiInputDevice.TempoSynchronizationEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether or not the system should respond to attempts to synchronize the tempo using MIDI realtime time clock messages
member.remarks: This is somewhat inaccurate, as .NET's latency is too high for an accurate measurement?

member.name: P:M.MidiInputDevice.TempoSychronizationFrequency
member.summary: Indicates the quantization factor to use for tempo synchronization

member.name: P:M.MidiInputDevice.TempoSynchronizationMinimumMicroTempo
member.summary: Indicates the minumum micro tempo for the tempo synchronization feature

member.summary: Indicates the minumum tempo for the tempo synchronization feature

member.summary: Indicates the index of the input device

member.summary: Indicates the name of the input device

member.summary: Indicates the version of the driver associated with the device

member.summary: Indicates the product code for the device

member.summary: Indicates the manufacturer code for the device

member.name: M:M.MidiInputDevice.Open
member.summary: Opens the MIDI input device

member.name: M:M.MidiInputDevice.Close
member.summary: Closes the MIDI input device

member.name: M:M.MidiInputDevice.Start
member.summary: Starts the MIDI input device

member.name: M:M.MidiInputDevice.Stop
member.summary: Stops the MIDI input device

member.name: M:M.MidiInputDevice.Reset
member.summary: Resets the MIDI input device

member.name: M:M.MidiInputDevice.StartRecording(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starts recording to a MIDI file
member.param: True if recording should be deferred until MIDI input is recieved, otherwise false to start right away

member.name: M:M.MidiInputDevice.EndRecording(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ends the current recording session, returning a MIDI file
member.param: Indicates whether or not the silent remainder of the recording (if any) is trimmed
member.returns: The MIDI file containing the recorded performance, or null if recording was never started.
member.remarks: The returned file is always a type 1 MIDI file at the stream's timebase, and following the stream's tempo. The file consists of two tracks. Track 0 is a meta track containing the tempo map, and the other track contains the performance data

member.name: T:M.MidiKeySignature

member.name: T:M.MidiSequence
member.summary: Represents a MIDI sequence
member.remarks: Each of these corresponds to one MIDI track

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new MIDI sequence

member.name: P:M.MidiSequence.Events
member.summary: Indicates the events of the MIDI sequence

member.name: P:M.MidiSequence.FirstDownBeat
member.summary: Indicates the first downbeat of the MIDI sequence

member.name: P:M.MidiSequence.FirstNoteOn
member.summary: Indicates the first note on message in the MIDI sequence

member.name: P:M.MidiSequence.RootNoteId
member.summary: Gets the root note id of the sequence or > 127 if not found

member.name: P:M.MidiSequence.RootNote
member.summary: Retrieves the root note of the sequence or null if not found

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.GetContext(System.Int32,System.Int16)
member.summary: Gets the at the specified position
member.param: The position to retrieve the context from, in ticks
member.returns: A MIDI context for this position

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.GetPositionAtTime(System.Int64,System.Int16)
member.summary: Gets the MIDI tick position for the current sequence at the current time
member.param: The number of system ticks elapsed
member.returns: The number of ticks corresponds to for this sequence

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.GetNextEventAtPosition(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the next event in the sequence from the position specified by . The event's delta is modified such that it reflects the difference between the requested position and the time the note should be played.
member.param: True if the sequence should be treated as a loop, and the position logically wrapped if it's past the end of the track, otherwise false
member.returns: A with an adjusted delta, or null if the sequence is empty or if is false and there are no more events after

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.GetEventsByChannel(M.MidiChannels)
member.summary: Returns an enumeration of events targeting the specified .
member.param: The channels to return as flags
member.returns: All of the events targeting the specified channel, with deltas adjusted

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.GetNextEventsAtPosition(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the next events in the sequence from the position specified by . The event's delta is modified such that it reflects the difference between the requested position and the time the note should be played.
member.param: True if the sequence should be treated as a loop, and the position logically wrapped if it's past the end of the track, otherwise false
member.returns: A series of objects, the first with an adjusted delta, or empty if the sequence is empty or if is false and there are no more events after

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.GetPositionAtTime(System.TimeSpan,System.Int16)
member.summary: Gets the MIDI tick position for the current sequence at the current time
member.param: The span of time that has elapsed
member.returns: The number of ticks corresponds to for this sequence

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.GetRange(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a range of MIDI events as a new sequence
member.param: The start of the range to retrieve in pulses/ticks
The length of the range to retrieve in pulses/ticks
True to copy the current patch and timing info to the range, otherwise false
member.returns: A new MIDI sequence with the specified range of events

member.name: P:M.MidiSequence.Name
member.summary: Indicates the name of the sequence, or null if no name is present

member.name: P:M.MidiSequence.Instrument
member.summary: Indicates the name of the instrument in the MIDI sequence or null if not known

member.name: P:M.MidiSequence.Copyright
member.summary: Indicates the copyright of the MIDI sequence or null if unspecified

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.ToNoteMap
member.summary: Retrieves a note map for the sequence
member.returns: A list of instances representing the note map

member.summary: Retrieves a new MIDI sequence given the specified note map
member.returns: A new MIDI sequence from the specified note map

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.Merge(M.MidiSequence[])
member.summary: Merges this sequence with other MIDI sequences
member.param: The sequences to merge this sequence with
member.returns: A new MIDI sequence that is a merge

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.Merge(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{M.MidiSequence})
member.summary: Merges this sequence with other MIDI sequences
member.param: The sequences to merge this sequence with
member.returns: A new MIDI sequence that is a merge

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.Transpose(System.SByte,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transposes the notes in a sequence, optionally wrapping the note values
member.param: The number of MIDI notes to add or subtract
True if out of range notes are wrapped, false if they are to be clipped
True if drums are to be skipped, otherwise false
member.returns: A new MIDI sequence with the notes transposed

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.Stretch(System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stretches or compresses the MIDI sequence events
member.remarks: If is false this will change the playback speed of the MIDI
member.param: The differential for the size. 1 is the same length, .5 would be half the length and 2 would be twice the length
Indicates whether or not the tempo should be adjusted to compensate
member.returns: A new MIDI sequence that is stretched the specified amount

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.AdjustTempo(System.Double)
member.summary: Adjusts the tempo of a sequence
member.returns: A new sequence with an adjusted tempo. All other tempo messages are adjusted relatively to the first one

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.AdjustTempo(System.Int32)
member.summary: Adjusts the tempo of a sequence
member.returns: A new sequence with an adjusted tempo. All other tempo messages are adjusted relatively to the first one

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.ScaleTempo(System.Double)
member.summary: Adjusts the tempo by the specified difference
member.param: A value indicating the multiplier. Larger makes the tempo higher.

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.NormalizeVelocities
member.summary: Scales all note velocities such that the highest velocity is now 127
member.returns: A new MIDI sequence with the velocities scaled

member.name: M:M.MidiSequence.ScaleVelocities(System.Double)
member.summary: Scales note velocities by the specified value
member.returns: A new sequence with the velocities adjusted

member.summary: Converts a string representation of a note to a MIDI note id

member.summary: Creates a MIDI note on message packed as an integer

member.summary: Packs a MIDI message as an int
member.returns: An integer representing the packed MIDI message
member.remarks: Must not be a sysex message

member.name: M:M.MidiUtility.PackMessage(M.MidiMessage)
member.summary: Packs a MIDI message as an int
member.returns: An integer representing the packed MIDI message
member.remarks: This is geared for the wire protocol, not files. The message must not be a sysex message

member.name: M:M.MidiUtility.UnpackMessage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Unpacks a MIDI message from an int
member.returns: An integer representing the packed MIDI message

member.summary: Gets the bytes that make up a MIDI message
member.param: The message to retrieve the bytes for
member.returns: An array of bytes containing the message data
member.remarks: This is geared for the wire protocol, not files
